tasks.title: Welcome to Your Muslim Identity Journey
tasks.description: Begin your 14-day journey by reflecting on what it means to be a proud Muslim. Take a moment to set your intentions and prepare your heart for this transformative experience.
tips: Find a quiet place for reflection
Write down your intentions in a journal
Make du'a for guidance throughout this journey

tasks.title: Master the Five Daily Prayers
tasks.description: Establish and perfect your five daily prayers (Salah). Focus on performing each prayer on time with proper concentration and remembrance of Allah.
tips: Set prayer reminders on your phone
Learn the meanings of the surahs you recite
Find a clean, quiet space for each prayer
Make du'a after each prayer

tasks.title: Connect with Your Muslim Community
tasks.description: Reach out to fellow Muslims in your community. Attend a local mosque event, join a study circle, or simply have a meaningful conversation with a Muslim friend or family member.
tips: Visit your local mosque's website for events
Join online Muslim community groups
Invite a Muslim friend for coffee or tea
Attend Friday prayers (Jumu'ah) if possible

tasks.title: Learn 10 New Arabic Phrases
tasks.description: Expand your Arabic vocabulary by learning 10 common Islamic phrases and their meanings. Practice using them throughout your day to strengthen your connection to Islamic tradition.
tips: Use flashcards or mobile apps for memorization
Practice pronunciation with online audio resources
Try to use each phrase in context during your day
Focus on phrases from daily prayers and Quran

tasks.title: Practice Islamic Values in Daily Interactions
tasks.description: Consciously embody Islamic values like honesty, kindness, patience, and justice in all your interactions today. Reflect on how your faith guides your behavior.
tips: Start each interaction with 'Assalamu Alaikum'
Practice patience in challenging situations
Show extra kindness to those in need
Be honest in all your dealings

tasks.title: Read and Reflect on Quran
tasks.description: Dedicate time to reading the Quran with contemplation. Choose a surah or verses that resonate with you and reflect deeply on their meanings and applications to your life.
tips: Read both Arabic and translation
Use a reliable tafsir (commentary) for deeper understanding
Take notes on verses that speak to you
Make du'a for guidance and understanding

tasks.title: Share Islamic Knowledge with Others
tasks.description: Share something beneficial you've learned about Islam with a friend, family member, or on social media. Focus on spreading knowledge in a respectful and engaging way.
tips: Choose authentic sources for your information
Share personal experiences alongside knowledge
Be respectful of different perspectives
Use social media wisely to spread positivity

tasks.title: Study Islamic History and Scholars
tasks.description: Learn about influential Islamic scholars, historical events, or Islamic contributions to science and civilization. Choose a topic that interests you and dive deep.
tips: Start with well-known scholars like Ibn Sina or Al-Ghazali
Use reputable Islamic educational websites
Take notes and create a personal knowledge journal
Discuss your learnings with knowledgeable Muslims

tasks.title: Express Your Muslim Identity Confidently
tasks.description: Find ways to express your Muslim identity with confidence and pride. This could be through your dress, speech, actions, or simply by being unashamed of your beliefs in public.
tips: Wear Islamic symbols or modest clothing with pride
Use Islamic greetings in appropriate settings
Don't hesitate to mention your prayer times when needed
Share your Islamic perspective respectfully when relevant

tasks.title: Perform Extra Acts of Worship
tasks.description: Go beyond your obligatory acts of worship. Perform extra prayers (nafl), make additional dhikr, read extra Quran, or engage in other voluntary acts of worship.
tips: Perform 2 rakats of Tahajjud prayer before Fajr
Make dhikr during free moments throughout the day
Recite Surah Al-Mulk before sleeping
Make du'a during the blessed times of day

tasks.title: Engage in Islamic Community Service
tasks.description: Participate in community service through an Islamic organization or mosque. Help with food drives, charity work, or volunteer at Islamic events.
tips: Contact your local mosque for volunteer opportunities
Join Islamic charity organizations
Help organize community iftars or events
Mentor younger Muslims in your community

tasks.title: Deepen Your Understanding of Islamic Jurisprudence
tasks.description: Study an aspect of Islamic law (fiqh) that's relevant to your daily life. Learn about the wisdom behind Islamic rulings and how they apply to modern situations.
tips: Choose topics relevant to your daily life
Consult multiple reliable scholarly sources
Ask knowledgeable scholars if you have questions
Understand the wisdom behind the rulings

tasks.title: Stand Up for Islamic Values
tasks.description: Find an opportunity to respectfully advocate for Islamic values or correct misconceptions about Islam. This could be in person, online, or through your actions.
tips: Prepare yourself with knowledge before speaking
Approach discussions with wisdom and good manners
Use your actions to demonstrate Islamic values
Be patient and respectful with those who disagree

tasks.title: Create Islamic Content or Art
tasks.description: Express your faith creatively by creating Islamic content, art, writing, videos, or any form of creative expression that reflects your Muslim identity and values.
tips: Write Islamic poetry or reflective articles
Create Islamic calligraphy or geometric art
Make educational videos about Islam
Design inspiring Islamic quotes for social media

tasks.title: Commit to Your Ongoing Islamic Journey
tasks.description: Reflect on your 14-day journey and make concrete commitments for continuing your growth as a proud Muslim. Create a personal action plan for maintaining and building upon what you've learned.
tips: Write a reflection journal about your journey
Set specific, measurable goals for the future
Find an accountability partner for continued growth
Make du'a for consistency and strength in your faith
Plan to repeat or extend this challenge in the future

importMetadata.description: 14-Day Proud Muslim Challenge - Complete task set designed to help Muslims strengthen their identity, knowledge, worship, and community connections
